title: BulkOperationsPrice
description: This schema is used to set prices for merchant skus.  An overall price must be set for the product and a price can also be further refined by setting the price at the fulfillment node level.

{merchantSku}.description: The merchant SKU that should be affected by the prices in this object. The {merchantSKU} field should be the Merchant SKU that price is being updated for.

merchant_sku_price.title: merchantSkuPrice
merchant_sku_price.description: The merchant SKU that should be affected by the prices in this object. The {merchantSKU} field should be the Merchant SKU that price is being updated for.

price.description: The overall price that the merchant SKU is priced at

fulfillment_node_id.description: The fulfillment node assigned in the Jet Merchant Portal for a merchant fulfillment node

fulfillment_node_price.description: The price of the Merchant SKU at the fulfillment node level
